tweet: If you‚Äôve been the victim of a scam or suspect you‚Äôve been scammed, contact the USC Department of Public Safety at (213) 740-6000.

name: USC DPS
tweet: - Never provide your financial or social security information or over the phone or online to someone you do not know. - Do not respond to messages or friend requests from strangers. - Decline the calls from numbers that you do not know.  #ScamPreventionTip

name: USC DPS
tweet: - A law enforcement agency, such as LAPD, or a government agency, such as ICE or the IRS, will never contact you over the phone or online requesting for money. - Do not make payments over the phone or online using gift cards, cryptocurrency, or wire transfers. #ScamPreventionTip

tweet: Be aware of scams. Learn how to protect yourself from and respond to scams with some scam prevention tips from @USCDPSACBurke.  https://t.co/mNsqLQnrAa
